pyqgis_plugin.name: sw2LayerSearch
pyqgis_plugin.description: General purpose layer search tool - exports attributes to csv file.
pyqgis_plugin.about: General purpose tool, similarto other layer\constraint checking plugins. Developed specifically to replace functionality available to SW2 GIS users in previous systems. The plugin allows the user to search all layers not set as non-identifialble within a selected or drawn polygon, the attributes of each feature found by a spatial query based on this polygon are then exported to a csv file. The seach polygon is also saved to the csv file along with features counts per layer and column headers. The plugin will open the csv file with the associated application for the OS..
